event: high total leukocyte counts with left shift
activated partial thromboplastin time was prolonged
ultrasound of the kidneys revealed enlarged kidneys with bilateral renal abscesses
emergency ultrasound-guided drainage of renal abscesses
pus drained was sent for bacterial, fungal, and mycobacterial smear and culture
GenExpert polymerase chain reaction test for Mycobacterium tuberculosis was negative
X-ray chest and electrocardiogram were normal
cultures from both renal abscesses revealed growth of Aspergillus fumigatus
